summary: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.
cast: Catinca Untaru|Justine Waddell|Lee Pace|Kim Uylenbroek|Aiden Lithgow|Sean Gilder|Ronald France|Andrew Roussouw|Michael Huff|Grant Swanby|Emil Hostina|Robin Smith|Jeetu Verma|Leo Bill|Marcus Wesley|Ayesha Verman|Julian Bleach|Ketut Rina|Camilla Waldman|Elvira Deatcu|Emma Johnstone|Daniel Caltagirone|Nico Soultanakis|Jon Kamen|Karen Haacke|Emma Maria Landberg|Miguel Hernández|Oscar Moreno|David Parra|Stephen Hughes
title: The Fall. El sueño de Alexandria
